meaningMnemonic: A <radical>mountain</radical> <radical>branch</radical> will <kanji>branch off</kanji> from the rest.
readingMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>branch off</kanji> from your hiking group and explore this branch of the mountain, you need a special <reading>key</reading> (き). Just don't get caught down there or you'll get the <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ).
